name: SOMA AVIATION TRAINING CENTRE
about: SOMA Aviation Training Centre is a modern and world-class aviation training institution based in Tanzania, dedicated to providing outstanding training for aspiring aviators. Our state-of-the-art facilities are designed to inspire and elevate performance, offering tailor-made courses that ensure quality education. With well-experienced and friendly instructors, we cater to a range of training needs, including cargo operations and flight operations. Our commitment to innovation and excellence makes us a leading choice for aviation training in Tanzania and beyond. We strive to equip our students with the skills and knowledge necessary to succeed in the aviation industry.
services:
["Flight Operations Officer
Leadership Program
Aviation Security Awareness
Dangerous Goods Awareness
Hospitality Management
Cargo Introductory Course"]
